scripts.release-test: yarn build && mkdir -p releases && cd build && sed -i 's/Glowforge Material Manager/Glowforge Material Manager Test/g' manifest.json && sed -i "s/const extensionId = 'mncodmmfhiaolnkmjdjdemghkbcbiing'/\/\/ const extensionId = 'mncodmmfhiaolnkmjdjdemghkbcbiing'/g" content.js && sed -i "s/\/\/ const extensionId = 'oehpknagabkobfeijndckpapicmfoknn'/const extensionId = 'oehpknagabkobfeijndckpapicmfoknn'/g" content.js && zip -r glowforge-material-manager-test.zip . && mv -f *.zip ../releases && cd ..
scripts.release: yarn build && mkdir -p releases && cd build && sed -i "s/const extensionId = 'mncodmmfhiaolnkmjdjdemghkbcbiing'/\/\/ const extensionId = 'mncodmmfhiaolnkmjdjdemghkbcbiing'/g" content.js && sed -i "s/\/\/ const extensionId = 'adabmafjmdcjnihkmggljljeopjfghii'/const extensionId = 'adabmafjmdcjnihkmggljljeopjfghii'/g" content.js && zip -r glowforge-material-manager.zip . && mv -f *.zip ../releases && cd ..
